description: Hi folks. Full one bed room apartment at your disposal. Sleeps up to four. Close to the NQR train and just twenty minutes from midtown Manhattan. Enjoy the great bars and restaurants of Astoria, or use the apartment as your base to explore all that NYC has to offer.
name: 1-Bedroom Apt Near Manhattan
review: Overall, an excellent choice for the price we paid! Check-in was smooth and Matt was very communicative. The place was great for the price we paid. A little on the older side, but still good! Would definitely recommend to anyone.
